languages.text: "Мы переживем и это испытание. И когда все закончится — мы будем вместе".
"We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."
languages.original_text: "Мы переживем и это испытание. И когда все закончится — мы будем вместе".

traits.locale_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."
"We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."
"We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."
"We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."

languages.text: 「この審判も乗り越えてみせよう。すべてが終われば、私たちは結ばれる」
languages.original_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."

traits.locale_text: 「この審判も乗り越えてみせよう。すべてが終われば、私たちは結ばれる」

languages.text: “这场试炼我们也一定能通过。等一切结束之后，我们就可以在一起了。”
languages.original_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."

traits.locale_text: “这场试炼我们也一定能通过。等一切结束之后，我们就可以在一起了。”

languages.text: "Wir werden auch diese Prüfung überleben. Und wenn alles vorbei ist, werden wir zusammen sein."
languages.original_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden auch diese Prüfung überleben. Und wenn alles vorbei ist, werden wir zusammen sein."

languages.text: «También sobreviviremos a esta prueba. Y, cuando termine, podremos estar juntos».
languages.original_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."

traits.locale_text: «También sobreviviremos a esta prueba. Y, cuando termine, podremos estar juntos».

languages.text: « Nous survivrons aussi à cette épreuve, et quand tout sera fini, plus rien ne menacera de nous séparer. »
languages.original_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."

traits.locale_text: « Nous survivrons aussi à cette épreuve, et quand tout sera fini, plus rien ne menacera de nous séparer. »

languages.text: "Bu sınavda da hayatta kalacağız. Ve her şey sona erdiğinde yine birlikte olacağız."
languages.original_text: "We will survive this trial also. And when it is all over, we will be together."
